meanings.definition: The act of flowing or rushing in.
meanings.sent1: The inrushings of water filled the cave quickly.
meanings.sent2: The inrushings of visitors to the museum were overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The inrushings of students into the classroom caused a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The inrushings of memories flooded her mind unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The inrushings of emotions during the movie made her tear up.

meanings.sent1: The inrushings of donations helped the charity immensely.
meanings.sent2: The inrushings of orders kept the store busy all day.
meanings.sent3: The inrushings of compliments made her blush with happiness.
meanings.sent4: The inrushings of sunlight through the window brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The inrushings of ideas sparked a creative frenzy in the team.
